languages.text: {n}Нечеловеческие зрачки сужаются в рубиновых глазах Кассии, и пол начинает плыть под вашими ногами.{/n} "Вы были в своем праве, Лорд-капитан. То, что представители Дома Орселлио позволили себе сотворить на мире-столице Вольного Торговца... Попросту недопустимо".

traits.locale_text: {n}Нечеловеческие зрачки сужаются в рубиновых глазах Кассии, и пол начинает плыть под вашими ногами.{/n} "Вы были в своем праве, Лорд-капитан. То, что представители Дома Орселлио позволили себе сотворить на мире-столице Вольного Торговца... Попросту недопустимо".

languages.text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."
languages.original_text: {n}Нечеловеческие зрачки сужаются в рубиновых глазах Кассии, и пол начинает плыть под вашими ногами.{/n} "Вы были в своем праве, Лорд-капитан. То, что представители Дома Орселлио позволили себе сотворить на мире-столице Вольного Торговца... Попросту недопустимо".

What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

{n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

{n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅红宝石般的瞳孔缩小了，你感觉脚下的地板开始摇晃起来。{/n}“你的决定完全在你的权利范围内，舰长大人。奥赛罗家族的代表在行商浪人的首都世界的所作所为……简直令人无法接受。”
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅红宝石般的瞳孔缩小了，你感觉脚下的地板开始摇晃起来。{/n}“你的决定完全在你的权利范围内，舰长大人。奥塞罗家族的代表在行商浪人的首都世界的所作所为……简直令人无法接受。”

languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

languages.text: {n}Las inhumanas pupilas de los ojos de rubí de Cassia se estrechan y el suelo empieza a tambalearse bajo tus pies.{/n} «Estaba en su derecho, Lord Capitán. Lo que los representantes de la casa Orsellio hicieron en el mundo capital de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente... es inaceptable».
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las inhumanas pupilas de los ojos de rubí de Cassia se estrechan y el suelo empieza a tambalearse bajo tus pies.{/n} «Estaba en su derecho, Lord Capitán. Lo que los representantes de la casa Orsellio hicieron en el mundo capital de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente... es inaceptable».

languages.text: {n}カシアのルビーのような赤い瞳の人間離れした瞳孔が細くなり、床が足元でぐらつき始める。{/n}「あなたは自分の権利の範囲内で行動したのです、ロード・キャプテン。オーセリオ家の代表が、自由開拓者の首都惑星で行ったことは…断じて容認できることではありません」
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアのルビーのような赤い瞳の人間離れした瞳孔が細くなり、床が足元でぐらつき始める。{/n}「あなたは自分の権利の範囲内で行動したのです、ロード・キャプテン。オーセリオ家の代表が、自由開拓者の首都惑星で行ったことは…断じて容認できることではありません」

languages.text: {n}Die unmenschlichen Pupillen in Cassias rubinroten Augen verengen sich, und der Boden unter deinen Füßen fühlt sich plötzlich wacklig an.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch im Rahmen Eurer Rechte bewegt, Lord Captain. Was die Vertreter von Haus Orsellio sich auf der Hauptwelt des Freihändlers erlaubt haben ... ist schlicht inakzeptabel."
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die unmenschlichen Pupillen in Cassias rubinroten Augen verengen sich, und der Boden unter deinen Füßen fühlt sich plötzlich wacklig an.{/n} "Ihr habt Euch im Rahmen Eurer Rechte bewegt, Lord Captain. Was die Vertreter von Haus Orsellio sich auf der Hauptwelt des Freihändlers erlaubt haben ... ist schlicht inakzeptabel."

languages.text: {n}Alors que les pupilles non-humaines de Cassia se contractent, vous sentez le sol ondoyer sous vos pieds.{/n} « Vous avez agi selon vos droits, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce que les représentants de la maison Orsellio se sont permis sur le monde-capitale {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}... était tout bonnement inacceptable. »
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Alors que les pupilles inhumaines de Cassia se contractent, vous sentez le sol ondoyer sous vos pieds.{/n} « Vous avez agi selon vos droits, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce que les représentants de la maison Orsellio se sont permis sur le monde capitale {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}... était tout bonnement inacceptable. »

languages.text: {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözlerinin soğuk göz bebekleri daralıyor, sanki üzerinde durduğun zemin sallanıyor.{/n} "Ne yapsan yeridir Lord Kaptan. Orsellio Hanesi'nin temsilcilerinin Hür Tacir'in başdünyasında yedikleri haltlar, gerçekten de kabul edilir gibi değil."
languages.original_text: {n}The inhuman pupils of Cassia's ruby-red eyes narrow, and the floor starts to feel wobbly under your feet.{/n} "You acted within your rights, Lord Captain. What the representatives of House Orsellio permitted themselves on the Rogue Trader's capital world... is simply unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia'nın yakut kırmızısı gözlerinin insana benzemeyen göz bebekleri daralıyor. Üzerinde durduğun zemin sallanıyor sanki.{/n} "Ne yapsan yeridir Lord Kaptan. Orsellio Hanesi'nin temsilcilerinin Hür Tacir'in başdünyasında yedikleri haltlar, gerçekten de kabul edilir gibi değil."
